features.featureTitle: Completely delete the current contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V10000 “NEXUS OMNIVERSE” code provided by the user (full overwrite), preserving all components, local mock data/constants, imports, Tailwind classes, UI strings, and interaction logic as given.

Ensure the V10000 `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` implementation compiles and runs in this repository by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by repo wiring/dependencies (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, undefined identifiers referenced in JSX, invalid JSX, missing action functions referenced by components, or duplicate default exports), without changing the intended V10000 UI layout, styling, copy, datasets, or interaction behavior.
